title: "R Notebook"
output: html_notebook

```{r}
library(MASS)
library(ISLR)
library(tidyr)
library(dplyr)
library(readr)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}

consolidated_data <- read_csv("consolidated_data.csv")
head(consolidated_data)
attach(consolidated_data)
```

```{r}
result <- consolidated_data %>%
  dplyr::select(current_cal, voltage, flux, temp, gal_in, gal_out, power, in_rate, out_rate, pump_voltage, vdrop, pump_power, power_loss, 'W/m^2 Solar Radiation') %>%
  na.omit %>%
  cor() %>%
  round(3)
result
```

```{r}
plot(current_cal)
outliers <- which(current_cal < -1)
current_cal[outliers] <- 0
plot(voltage, current_cal, col=scale('W/m^2 Solar Radiation')*2+3)
```
